Topic.Title: Reference documents for Quest's ASLX format

Posts.EditableText:
I am curious, are there any reference/design documents for ASLX files? I suspect not, but would like to check, just in case :)
This page is nice - [http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/aslx.html](http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/quest/aslx.html), but a document that specifies edge cases would be nice.

I am curious, are there any reference/design documents for ASLX files? I suspect not, but would like to check, just in case :)
